name: Candles Have Feelings
description:
Candles Have Feelings By Jordan Ottesen

You are a sentient birthday candle... and you desperately want to keep your flame alive. 

Frantically run, jump, dodge, duck, and wall-jump your way to safety as a joyful but relentless birthday boy tries to blow out your flame in this vibrant retro-style platformer. Go the extra mile and try to collect all the cookies on the way. Go on, you won't.

Made for GMC Jam 40 (2021 - 10 year anniversary).
